title: Justin Amash
deleted: In May 2021 Amash felt that it was "a bit misguided" to call Republican Rep. [[Liz Cheney]] a hero for speaking out against Trump, as she did not speak out sooner.  He said, "We had four years where she could have stood up and said, 'There's a problem here. What Donald Trump is doing is wrong.'"  Amash noted that Cheney never came to his aid when he spoke out against Trump.<ref>{{cite web |last1=Stracqualursi |first1=Veronica |title=Justin Amash questions why Liz Cheney didn't speak out about Trump sooner | date=December 8, 2012 |url=https://www.cnn.com/2021/05/20/politics/justin-amash-liz-cheney-axe-files/index.html |website=CNN.com |access-date=May 20, 2021}}</ref>
